T02D3682:313a-1: shr'i s'i ta t'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3682:313a-3: dpal sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3682:313a-4: dpal sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3682:313a-5: 'chi ba'i skyon gyis gos min la //
T02D3682:313a-6: zla ba drug gi mthar thug par //
T02D3682:313a-7: sgrol ma'i thugs kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D3682:313a-8: bsgrims bsgoms dngos grub thams cad rnyed //
T02D3682:313a-9: ngag gi dbang phyug gis byas pa'i //
T02D3682:313a-10: 'chi ba slu ba kun bsdus las //
T02D3682:313a-11: sgrol ma dkar mo phyung 'di ni //
T02D3682:313a-12: bsgoms pas 'jigs pa spong bar byed //
T02D3682:313a-13: bzhi pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa a'a //
T02D3682:313a-15: padma dkar dang zla gdan la //
T02D3682:313a-16: mdun bltas gsum la skyabs 'gro brjod //
T02D3682:313a-17: yud tsam stong pa nyid bsgoms nas //
T02D3682:313a-18: so so skye bo'i 'khrul bcom ste //
T02D3682:313a-19: rdo rjes smon lam mthu nyid kyis //
T02D3682:313a-20: byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom //
T02D3682:313a-21: padma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa //
T02D3682:313a-22: zla ba'i gzugs kyi gdan steng du //
T02D3682:313a-23: rdo rje skyil krung rab bcings shing //
T02D3682:313b-1: ston ka'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i mdog //
T02D3682:313b-2: rgyab tu zla ba yang dag brten //
T02D3682:313b-3: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D3682:313b-4: bcu drug lo lon sku mnga' ba'o //
T02D3682:313b-5: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams de yi sras //
T02D3682:313b-8: dkar mdangs 'phags ma sgrol ma bsgom //
T02D3682:313b-9: brgyad kyi rtsibs can brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D3682:313b-10: yi ges yongs su gang ba nyid //
T02D3682:313b-11: aom h'a yi ge'i dbus gnas pa //
T02D3682:313b-12: bsgrub bya'i ming ldan lte bar ro //
T02D3682:313b-13: zla ba drug tu nges brten par //
T02D3682:313b-14: mi bde med pa'i sems yin pas //
T02D3682:313b-15: rtse gcig sems kyis bsgom bya zhing //
T02D3682:313b-16: yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di bzlas //
T02D3682:313b-17: aom yig thog mar byin byas nas //
T02D3682:313b-18: phyis ni t'a re rab tu sbyar //
T02D3682:313b-20: sv'a h'a mtha' yin las kun la'o ;
T02D3682:313b-21: / tshangs dbang khyab 'jug zla nyi dang //
T02D3682:313b-22: drag po phyogs skyong 'dod pa'i lhas //
T02D3682:313b-23: spu yi rtse yang bskyod mi nus //
T02D3682:313b-24: 'chi ba las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin //
T02D3682:313b-25: gnyer ma skra dkar skal ngan dang //
T02D3682:313b-26: nad dang dbul po nyams par byed //
T02D3682:313b-27: seng ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad //
T02D3682:313b-28: sdug bsngal tshogs rnams sel bar byed //
T02D3682:313b-29: bza' dang btung ba gos dang ni //
T02D3682:313b-30: khang bzangs rin chen ldan mi slong //
T02D3682:313b-31: ral gri mig sman rkang byug dang //
T02D3682:313b-32: bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D3682:313b-33: snyan dngags rtsod dang mi brjed dang //
T02D3682:313b-34: shes rab gcig tu dri ma med //
T02D3682:313b-35: 'dod pa gzhan yang grub byed pa //
T02D3682:313b-37: sgrol ma dkar mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3682:313b-39: phyung ba'i dge ba gang thob des //
T02D3682:313b-40: 'gro kun sgrol ma'i bdag nyid shog //
T02D3682:313b-41: sgrol ma dkar mo 'chi ba slu ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3682:313b-42: slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3682:313b-44: // / dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla
T02D3682:313b-45: dang bral ba'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bha
